nodes.text: Eidolon's safe house was a safe house on Nar Shaddaa owned by an assassin Eidolon during the Cold War. During the Great Hunt (c. 3643 BBY), a Hunter confronted Eidolon, who was a target of the Great Hunt, in his safe house and defeated him after a battle.
Eidolon's safe house appear as an area on Nar Shaddaa in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Bounty Hunter class mission.
